casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marvin Everett MILLER, Jr. 217P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 3, 2017 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Marvin Everette (Jr.) David J. Adinolfi, II, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of July 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of July 2017."
